name: Morning exercise
description: Start the day with a 30-minute workout or jog.

name: Breakfast
description: Prepare and eat a healthy breakfast.

name: Check and respond to personal emails
description: Review and reply to any personal emails.

name: Coffee with friends
description: Meet friends for coffee and catch up.

name: Meditation
description: Practice meditation for 15 minutes to relax and clear your mind.

name: Lunch
description: Prepare and eat a balanced lunch.

name: House cleaning
description: Clean and organize a part of your house.

name: Pick up package
description: Collect a package from the post office or delivery point.

name: Call family
description: Spend some time catching up with family members over the phone.

name: Afternoon walk
description: Take a short walk in the afternoon to get some fresh air.

name: Hobby time
description: Dedicate time to work on a personal hobby or project.

name: Cook dinner
description: Prepare and cook a healthy dinner.

name: Watch a movie or TV show
description: Relax and watch a movie or your favorite TV show.

name: Evening stretch
description: Do some light stretching exercises before bed.

name: Plan for the next day
description: Make a to-do list for the next day and set your priorities.

name: Journal
description: Write down your thoughts, reflections, or experiences from the day.

name: Get ready for bed
description: Follow your bedtime routine and ensure you get enough sleep.
